thread.title: Football: Reports: Unhappy Carlos Tevez ready to leave China
thread.title_full: Football: Reports: Unhappy Carlos Tevez ready to leave China

title: Football: Reports: Unhappy Carlos Tevez ready to leave China
text:
By Game Yetu  11 
Carlos Tevez is reportedly unhappy at Shanghai Shenhua, less than two months after he signed a two-year deal with the Chinese Super League club. 
Tevez is the highest-paid player in world football and earns around £615,000-a-week, but According to the Sun, the former Manchester City striker is struggling with life in China. 
The report claims that Boca Juniors are trying to get a plan to bring Tevez back to the club as soon as possible. 
However, Carlos Tevez’s agent has rubbished reports linking the Former Manchester United and Man City striker with a move back to his homeland.
